scripts.start: nodemon --watch 'packages/semver/**/*.ts' --exec npx ts-node --project ./packages/semver/tsconfig.lib.json packages/semver/cli/semver.ts last-version --debug --workspace nx
scripts.last-version: npx ts-node --project ./packages/semver/tsconfig.lib.json packages/semver/cli/semver.ts last-version --debug --workspace nx --output json -c rc
scripts.next-version: npx ts-node --project ./packages/semver/tsconfig.lib.json packages/semver/cli/semver.ts next-version --debug --workspace nx --output json
